content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to specific information about all games and their reward systems. However, many games do offer rewards or incentives for reaching higher tiers in their ranking systems. These rewards could range from cosmetic items such as new character skins or badges to in-game currency, virtual items, or game-changing perks. The rewards could be given out at the end of a competitive season, or players could earn them as they progress to higher ranks. The exact rewards offered could vary from game to game, and even between different competitive modes in the same game. It's best to check with the specific game's developer or community to learn more about the rewards system for reaching higher tiers.
